name: Healthyfied Lemon Orange Chicken Thighs
description: Indulge in a high-protein, low-carb, and low-sugar culinary delight with our Healthyfied Lemon Orange Chicken Thighs. These succulent chicken thighs, marinated in a zesty lemon-orange sauce, not only cater to your health goals but also promise a burst of flavors that'll leave you craving for more. Perfect for anyone following a health-conscious diet without sacrificing taste.
recipeIngredient: 600 g Chicken Thigh Fillet - Boneless With Skin

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the chicken by patting the chicken thigh fillets dry with a paper towel.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Season the chicken thighs on both sides with the ground black pepper, salt, granulated garlic, and dried thyme.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, mix the orange sauce, juice from 1 lemon, cornstarch, and stevia sachets until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: In a skillet over medium-high heat, melt the butter. Once hot, add the seasoned chicken thighs, skin-side down, and sear until golden brown, about 5 minutes each side.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Once the chicken thighs are browned, transfer them to a baking dish and pour the lemon-orange sauce mixture over the chicken.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in the preheated oven until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce thickens, about 25-30 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Let the chicken rest for a few minutes before serving. The resting time allows the juices to redistribute, ensuring your chicken is juicy and flavorful.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
